ï»¿import {ITabsController} from "./tabs-controller";
 
export interface ITabController {
    tabId: string;
    tabTitle: string;
    selected: boolean;
    select: () => void;
    hide: () => void;
    show: () => void;
    init: (tabsController: ITabsController) => void;
}
 
export class TabController implements ITabController {
    public tabId: string;
    public tabTitle: string;
    public selected: boolean = false;
 
    public init = (tabsController: ITabsController): void => {
        this.tabsController = tabsController;
        this.tabsController.addTab(this);
    };
 
    public select = (): void => {
        if (this.selected) {
            return;
        }
 
        Ithis.tabsController.selectTab(this);
    };
 
    public hide = (): void => {
        this.selected = false;
    };
 
    public show = (): void => {
        this.selected = true;
    };
 
    private tabsController: ITabsController;
}
 
export default TabController;
